Test 106

Use URLHyphenation for a specific element.

Hyphenation is not alway good. Things like "Content-Type: application/json" should not be hyphenated but treated like an URL instead.

Hy|phen|ation is not alway good. Things like "Content-·Type:· app·lica·tion/·json" should not be hy|phen|ated but treated like an URL in|stead.
